original_text: with it he made the bases for the entrance of the tent of meeting, the bronze altar and the bronze grating for it and all the utensils of the altar,
korean_text: 이것으로 회막 문 기둥 받침과 놋 제단과 놋 그물과 제단의 모든 기구를 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: with it he made the bases for the entrance of the tent of meeting,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것으로 그는 회막 입구의 받침들을 만들었고,

sentences.original_text: and the bronze grating for it
and all the utensils of the altar,
